::Dragoon::
     Hre glanced over his shoulder at where he came from and spotted tghe incoming missiles.  He activated his shields and the missiles exploded safely behind him although the shock wave knocked him into a tree.  He shook it off and began slowly wandering back toward the battle but staying out of sight.
